synonyms: trivikrama—Lord Trivikrama; padma—lotus; gadā—club; cakra—disc; śaṅkha—conch; kara—in the hands; śrī-vāmana—Lord Vāmana; śaṅkha—conch; cakra—disc; gadā—club; padma—lotus; dhara—holding.
translation: "Lord Trivikrama holds the lotus, club, disc and conch. Lord Vāmana holds the conch, disc, club and lotus.
